TopicTitle: What planet/moon has the highest ore percentage

Articles.Content: Which one and are they random

The ore densities are randomly generated for each new game.

The probabilities for each resource-biome-combination are in the file

GameData\Squad\Resources\ore.cfg
It depends. I have quite good experience with Val, but it's really random. Class E asteroids also make for cool refueling stations - if you can get them somewhere meaningful.
